law.catch_line: Commissioner of Department for Natural Resources -- Functions.

text.section: The Department for Natural Resources shall be headed by the commissioner of the Department for Natural Resources.
The department shall administer all laws of the Commonwealth relating to mines.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 57, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739-2, 2739-3, 3766b-15, 4618-38.
